externalAssetId.description: Asset id provided by the customer.

deviceRef.description: Reference to the device that provide data points for this asset. Must provide device name & endpoint on the device to use.

version.description: An integer that is incremented each time the resource is modified.

lastTransitionTime.description: A timestamp that is updated each time the resource is modified.

attributes.description: A set of key-value pairs that contain custom attributes set by the customer.

discoveredAssetRefs.description: Reference to a list of discovered assets. Populated only if the asset has been created from discovery flow. Discovered asset names must be provided.

defaultDatasetsConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON that contains connector-specific default configuration for all datasets. Each dataset can have its own configuration that overrides the default settings here.

defaultStreamsConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON that contains connector-specific default configuration for all streams. Each stream can have its own configuration that overrides the default settings here.

defaultEventsConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON that contains connector-specific default configuration for all events. Each event can have its own configuration that overrides the default settings here.

datasets.description: Array of datasets that are part of the asset. Each dataset describes the data points that make up the set.

events.description: Array of events that are part of the asset. Each event can have per-event configuration.

streams.description: Array of streams that are part of the asset. Each stream can have per-stream configuration.

status.description: Read only object to reflect changes that have occurred on the Edge. Similar to Kubernetes status property for custom resources.

config.description: Defines the asset status config properties.

datasets.description: Array of dataset statuses that describe the status of each dataset.

events.description: Array of event statuses that describe the status of each event.

streams.description: Array of stream statuses that describe the status of each stream.

AssetStatusDataset.description: Defines the asset status dataset properties.

name.description: The name of the dataset. Must be unique within the status.datasets array. This name is used to correlate between the spec and status dataset information.

error.description: Object to transfer and persist errors that originate from the Edge.

AssetStatusEvent.description: Defines the asset status event properties.

name.description: The name of the event. Must be unique within the status.events array. This name is used to correlate between the spec and status event information.

error.description: Object to transfer and persist errors that originate from the Edge.

AssetStatusStream.description: Defines the asset status stream properties.

name.description: The name of the stream. Must be unique within the status.streams array. This name is used to correlate between the spec and status event information.

error.description: Object to transfer and persist errors that originate from the Edge.

AuthenticationMethod.description: The method to authenticate the user of the client at the server.

values.name: Anonymous
values.description: The user authentication method is anonymous.

values.name: Certificate
values.description: The user authentication method is an x509 certificate.

values.name: UsernamePassword
values.description: The user authentication method is a username and password.

AutoTrust.description: Defines the AutoTrust for a TLS configuration.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Trust only the specified certificates or issers.

Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.System.description: Managed service identity (either system assigned, or none)

type.description: The type of managed identity assigned to this resource.

Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.Tracke.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource which has 'tags' and a 'location'

name.description: The name of the data point.

dataPointConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON that contains connector-specific configuration for the data point. For OPC UA, this could include configuration like, publishingInterval, samplingInterval, and queueSize.

dataSource.description: Name of the data source within a dataset.

typeRef.description: Uri or type definition id in companion spec.

datasetConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON that contains connector-specific JSON string that describes configuration for the specific dataset.

dataPoints.description: Array of data points that are part of the dataset. Each data point can have per-data point configuration.

version.description: A read only incremental counter indicating the number of times the configuration has been modified from the perspective of the current actual (Edge) state of the CRD. Edge would be the only writer of this value and would sync back up to the cloud. In steady state, this should equal version.

lastTransitionTime.description: A read only timestamp indicating the last time the configuration has been modified from the perspective of the current actual (Edge) state of the CRD. Edge would be the only writer of this value and would sync back up to the cloud.

error.description: Object to transfer and persist errors that originate from the Edge.

StatusError.description: Defines the status config error properties.

code.description: Error code for classification of errors (ex: '400', '404', '500', etc.).

message.description: Human readable helpful error message to provide additional context for error (ex: capability Id 'foo' does not exist).

details.description: Array of event statuses that describe the status of each event.

innerError.description: A set of key-value pairs that contain service specific details set by the service.

StatusErrorDetails.description: Defines the status config error details properties.

code.description: Multi-part error code for classification and root causing of errors (ex: 400.200.100.432).

message.description: Human readable helpful error message to provide additional context for error (ex: Authentication method not supported).

info.description: Human readable helpful detailed text context for debugging (ex: The following mechanisms are supported...).

correlationId.description: Unique identifier for the transaction to aid in debugging.

StorageDestinationConfiguration.description: The configuration for a Storage destination.

streamConfiguration.description: Stringified JSON that contains connector-specific JSON string that describes configuration for the specific stream.

typeRef.description: Uri or type definition id in companion spec.

StreamDestinationTarget.description: The set of supported Stream destinations for an Asset.

StreamMqttDestination.description: The type for a Mqtt destination.

StreamStorageDestination.description: The type for a Storage destination.

TrustSettings.description: Defines server trust settings for an endpoint.

autoTrust.description: Defines how to trust server certificates.

trustList.description: Defines a secret reference for certificates to trust. Either trustList or issuerList is required when autoTrust is set to false.

issuerList.description: Defines a secret reference for certificate issuers to trust. Either trustList or issuerList is required when autoTrust is set to false.

TrustSettingsUpdate.description: Defines server trust settings for an endpoint.

autoTrust.description: Defines how to trust server certificates.

trustList.description: Defines a secret reference for certificates to trust. Either trustList or issuerList is required when autoTrust is set to false.

issuerList.description: Defines a secret reference for certificate issuers to trust. Either trustList or issuerList is required when autoTrust is set to false.

UsernamePasswordCredentials.description: The credentials for authentication mode UsernamePassword.

usernameSecretName.description: The name of the secret containing the username.

passwordSecretName.description: The name of the secret containing the password.

UsernamePasswordCredentialsUpdate.description: The credentials for authentication mode UsernamePassword.

usernameSecretName.description: The name of the secret containing the username.

passwordSecretName.description: The name of the secret containing the password.

X509Credentials.description: The x509 certificate for authentication mode Certificate.

certificateSecretName.description: The name of the secret containing the certificate and private key (e.g. stored as .der/.pem or .der/.pfx).

X509CredentialsUpdate.description: The x509 certificate for authentication mode Certificate.

certificateSecretName.description: The name of the secret containing the certificate and private key (e.g. stored as .der/.pem or .der/.pfx).
